page.title: 03Recreation in Sandwich.
page.content: In Sandwich there are many different sorts of recreational facility. e.g. a boxing ring, numerous pubs, acres of open grassland, sports fields, slimming classes, cricket grounds, football pitches and the River Stour. The needs of the Old Age Pensioners (2/5th of the population) are also taken in to account with a bowling green, and bingo hall. The town walls also give a chance to walk along a well tended path. The river itself incorporates activities such as pleasure cruising, canoeing, fishing and rambling along its banks. Sandwich Bay also provides recreational facilities due to its privacy, shelter and beaches.
